page.title: 14 ASH SCHOOL SPORTS DAY
page.content: The infants have their running races while the juniors have their Potted Sports.Potted Sports are different games such as Football,Anagrams,Hockey, Netball and Bat and Ball.Then they change over. The juniors have teams called Fleet, Goldstone and Chequer.The 1st Year did their 60m Flat Race first.Two children from each team ran,the girls separately from the boys.Next the 2nd,3rd & 4th Years ran.The next races were the Skipp ing and Sack races,then the Team races then the Relay,the girls first,then the boys.The 4th-Year girl or boy had to run round the field.Then it was the long distance race,which was very exciting.When that was finished the mums had a skipping race.At the end the points were added up. Chequer came 3rd, Goldstone 2nd and Fleet 1st.Lady Pender one of our governors,presented the cup
